articles.title: Voice of America employees sue Trump administration over shuttered U.S.-funded news outlets
articles.description: Lawsuit seeks a court order reversing the decision to shutter the U.S. Agency for Global Media
articles.content:
Voice of America employees, journalists and unions sued the Trump administration in New York on Friday, saying that the shutdown of U.S.-funded news agencies violated the workers’ First Amendment right to journalistic freedom.
